scenario.sendRequestSIP:
INVITE sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] INVITE From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]>;tag=[localTag] To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Preferred-Identity: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 Privacy: none Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH Content-Type: application/sdp User-Agent: [UserAgent] Content-Length: x
v=0 o=[InviterName] 999 999 IN IP4 [InviterName]@[Domain] s=- c=IN IP4 [InviterName]@[Domain] t=0 0 m=audio 45200 RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application 25463 udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0

CANCEL sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseqNumber] CANCEL From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]>;tag=[localTag] To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[InviteeName]@[Domain]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [Adresse-TesterCSCF];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwardsDefaultValue] Route: <sip:[Adresse-TestedCSCF];lr>,<sip:[Adresse-ServerCSCF];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]" <sip:[InviterName]@[Domain]> P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-UTRAN-TDD; utran-cell-id-3gpp=00000000 User-Agent: [UserAgent] Content-Length: 0
